name: The Visitor Counter Plugin
author: The Visitor Counter Plugin

sections.description:
Plugin to show the current active visitors on the website

FUNCTIONS

  • Plugin counter of current users on site
  • Ability to change title
  • Change the background and text colors
  • Change the border radius
  • Change elements width
sections.installation:
1. Select ‘Add new’ in the ‘Plugins’ menu to find and install The Visitors Counter Plugin.
  2. Activate the plugin.

For full installation instructions, you can have a look at the plugin web site.
sections.changelog:
1.4.3

Extend compatibility to WordPress 5.5

1.4.2

Extend compatibility to WordPress 5.4.0

1.4.1

Added function to change border radius
Added function to change element width
Extend compatibility to WordPress 5.3.2

1.4.0

Extend compatibility to WordPress 5.3.0

1.3.0

Extend compatibility to WordPress 5.2.2

1.2.0

Support for Gutenber editor.

1.0.0

  • First release.
